mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.youwanluxian_name as youwanluxianName ,a.youwanluxian_uuid_number as youwanluxianUuidNumber ,a.youwanluxian_photo as youwanluxianPhoto ,a.youwanluxian_lvyoufangshi_types as youwanluxianLvyoufangshiTypes ,a.youwanluxian_chufashijian_types as youwanluxianChufashijianTypes ,a.youwanluxian_xingcheng_number as youwanluxianXingchengNumber ,a.youwanluxian_chuxingfangshi_types as youwanluxianChuxingfangshiTypes ,a.youwanluxian_clicknum as youwanluxianClicknum ,a.youwanluxian_content as youwanluxianContent ,a.youwanluxian_delete as youwanluxianDelete ,a.create_time as createTime
